subject: RE: Flock Safety | Follow Up
body:
Thanks for checking in.  I am working on getting all the new camera locations approved.  Everything else is going good.  


Derek

 

Detective D. DeWitt

Financial Crimes Unit

Special Weapons and Tactics Team

Background Investigations Team

Eugene Police Department

300 County Club Road

Eugene, OR 97401

Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

Work Cell � 541-743-6192

 



 

From: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, June 24, 2025 2:46 PM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Re: Flock Safety | Follow Up

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hello Detective DeWitt,  

 

Hope you are having a great week! Just left a voicemail on your cell - just wanted to make sure you feel fully comfortable with Raven Alerts now that Oregon Credit Union is set up in your account. Feel free to provide some good times next week to schedule a meeting and I would be happy to send over a calendar invite. 

 

Thanks!

 

On Mon, Jun 23, 2025 at 3:51?PM Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com > wrote:

	Hi @DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov  

	 

	Hope all is well. Do you have time next week for a check in call? I want to make sure everything is moving forward and any questions are getting ironed out. 

	 

	Thank you 

	 

	-- 

	
Gaby Mahoney
Customer Success Manager
